name: Adventure II
summary: An expanded version of the original Colossal Cave Adventure written by by Peter Luckett and Jack Pike that adds news areas and increases the max score to 440 points. While the original, complete source code is thought to be lost, a modern reconstruction, known as Adv440, was developed by Mike Arnautov in 2001, compiled in Perl based on the Fortran66 code that was still available.
